#summary How to create your first Flowplayer Open Ad Streamer test page
#sidebar TableOfContents

To create a Flowplayer test page that pulls the VAST data from the Open Video Ads demo server while serving the
video ads from the CDN used for all examples on this site, do the following:

  # [http://open-video-ads.googlecode.com/files/openvideoads.flowplayer.openadstreamer.bin.tar.gz Download] the OpenX Flowplayer Open Ad Streamer binaries (SWF)
  # Create a blank html page - the code examples below assume the blank page is created in the root directory of the downloaded plugin page (where `dist` is a subdirectory containing the swf and javascript files)
  #  Add the following lines to include the required javascript files. JQuery is used along with the Flowplayer 3.1 base javascript file
{{{
<script type="text/javascript" src="dist/jquery-1.3.1.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="dist/flowplayer-3.1.0.min.js"></script>
}}}
  #  Add the following style definition - this will be used to style the container for the flowplayer instance
{{{
<style type="text/css">
a.example {
	display:block;
	width:640px;
	height:360px;
	text-align:center;
}
</style>
}}}
  # Add in the anchor that is the container for the flowplayer instance
{{{
<a class="example"></a>
}}}
  # Finally add in the javascript to configure the Open Ad Streamer plugin and Flowplayer
{{{
<script type="text/javascript">
flowplayer("a.example", "../dist/flowplayer-3.1.3-dev.swf", {
    plugins: {
        controls: {
            autoHide: "always"
        },

        openAdStreamer: {
            url: '../dist/OpenAdStreamer.swf',

            "deliveryType": "streaming",
            "providers": { "rtmp": "../dist/flowplayer.rtmp-3.1.3-dev.swf" },

            "shows": {
                "baseURL": "rtmp://ne7c0nwbit.rtmphost.com/videoplayer",
                "streams": [ { "file":"mp4:the-black-hole.mp4", "duration":"00:00:10" } ]
            },

            "debug": {
                "debugger": "firebug",
                "levels": "fatal",
            },

            "ads": {
                "playOnce": false,
                "server": {
                    "type": "OpenX",
                    "vastURL": "http://openx.bouncingminds.com/openx/www/delivery/fc.php",
                },
                "schedule": [
                    {
                       "zone": "1",
                       "position": "pre-roll"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
});
</script>
}}}

You can see a working example of this page [http://www.bouncingminds.com/plugins/flowplayer/openx/rtmp/step1-example.html here].
